author: Jason Brown

text: As a former gambling company, Konami is returning to their roots by now trying to hook whales with mobile garbage. Sickening, but Konami was always gambling first, video gaming second or even third. Non-Japanese are largely unaware of the company's actual history.
author: Daytime Sky

text:
Still one of the reasons I highly regard SOTN's OST as one of the greatest gaming OSTs of all time!
And do keep in mind....I said ONE of the greatest gaming OSTs of all time.

text:

text:
@Supreme92 I never saw GameGrumps, but I know all about what's been going on with Konami just the same. It's news that's been going around.

As a former gambling company, they are returning to their roots by now trying to hook whales with mobile garbage. Sickening, but Konami was always gambling first, video gaming second or even third. Non-Japanese are largely unaware of the company's actual history.
author: Daytime Sky

text: @Supreme92 That's what I thought at first, but it seems it is actually because of the announcement of bloodstained

author: Fauntleroy

text: In the last SotN upload, I said I was sad to see Iga leave Konami and its Castlevania franchise, but even more excited to see his new solo projects on Kickstarter. With the way Konami has been run lately and Bloodstained's announcement, it really was for the best. I'm super excited for it, especially knowing that Yamane will be behind the music. Bring it on!
